name: Simple Chat (Start Here)
description: The most basic workflow: Input -> AI -> Output. Perfect for beginners.

name: The Tech Journalist
description: An automated news reporting agent. Searches web, synthesizes, and drafts an article.

name: The Idea Refiner
description: Iteratively improves an idea 3 times using a loop.

name: The Support Router
description: Routes messages based on sentiment (Angry vs Happy).

name: The Auto-Manager (Dynamic)
description: One Manager LLM assigns personas to 3 agents on the fly.

name: The Executive Board
description: Orchestrates 3 specialized agents (Analyst, Creative, Finance) to solve a task.

name: The Iterative Coder
description: Coder and Reviewer loop until the code is APPROVED.

name: The Diamond Pattern
description: Pros vs Cons analysis synthesized by a third agent.

name: The Research Team
description: Comprehensive research with web search and multiple expert perspectives.

name: Fallback System Test
description: Demonstrates auto-recovery from a broken model ID.

name: Document Analyzer (MapReduce)
description: Splits long text, processes in parallel, and reduces hierarchically.

name: The Jury (Self-Consistency)
description: Generates 5 diverse answers and selects the consensus via majority vote.

name: The Fact Checker (Debate)
description: Multi-round debate with a final Judge verdict.

name: The Ultimate Battle: MoA vs Debate
description: A grand showcase comparing MoA and Debate methodologies side-by-side.
